title: Unable to use chroma skins in new champ select
body: I'm loving the new draft pick, but I am unable to choose by chroma skins, specifically fizz. I'm not sure if it is just for him or for all champs, but the option to choose the chroma is not even there. Please allow us to use our purchased skins. Thanks!

replies.body:
Heya Cyco9119,

Thanks for the report! This is a known issue with the new champion select - there's a similar issue with ward skins. This feature should be added back into champion select with the next patch.
